metadata.title: CVE-2022-48826 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/vc4: Fix deadlock on DSI device attach errorDSI device attach to DSI host will be done with host device's lockheld.Un-registering
